https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7b6UOwFo75DT2e5wKdgPcVyab3N.jpg Adriana finds out the son she's expecting suffers a brain malformation that won't allow him to live outside her womb. As therapeutic abortion is illegal in Chile, she must wait until her baby is naturally born. Apio Verde
